title: A3 releases full three-part national safety standard for industrial robots
description:
A3 has published a comprehensive three-part national safety standard governing the manufacture, integration, and use of industrial robotics.

The post A3 releases full three-part national safety standard for industrial robots appeared first on The Robot Report.
content:
